text: Myristica xylocarpa is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is endemic to the Solomon Islands. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Myristica xylocarpa. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. Category:Flora of the Solomon Islands (archipelago) xylocarpa Category:Near threatened plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Myristica xylocarpa
